name: Predictive Vision Service demo
description: Image Classification with Salesforce's Predictive Vision API

PREDICTIVE_VISION_MODEL_ID.description: Optional - Your Predictive Vision Service Model ID.

PREDICTIVE_SERVICES_TOKEN.description: Optional - Your Predictive Services JWT Token. If set, this will override the apps token regeneration functionality.

PREDICTIVE_SERVICES_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Your Predictive Services Account ID (email address or add-on ID)

PREDICTIVE_SERVICES_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Your Predictive Services private rsa key
